method.name: addUserGroup
method.comment:
Adds a user group.

This method handles the creation and bookkeeping of the user group, including its resources, metadata, and internal data structures. It is not necessary to make subsequent calls to setup default groups and resources for the user group.

param.name: userId
param.comment: the primary key of the user

param.name: companyId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group's company

param.name: name
param.comment: the user group's name

param.name: description
param.comment: the user group's description

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if the user group's information was invalid

method.name: clearUserUserGroups
method.comment:
Clears all associations between the user and its user groups and clears the permissions cache.

This method is called from {@link #deleteUserGroup(UserGroup)}.

param.name: userId
param.comment: the primary key of the user

method.name: copyUserGroupLayouts
method.comment: Copies the user group's layouts to the users who are not already members of the user group.

param.name: userGroupId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group

param.name: userIds
param.comment: the primary keys of the users

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if any one of the users could not be found or if a portal exception occurred

method.name: hasGroupUserGroup
method.comment: Returns true if the user group is associated with the group.

param.name: groupId
param.comment: the primary key of the group

param.name: userGroupId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group

method.return: true if the user group belongs to the group; false otherwise

method.name: hasTeamUserGroup
method.comment: Returns true if the user group belongs to the team.

param.name: teamId
param.comment: the primary key of the team

param.name: userGroupId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group

method.return: true if the user group belongs to the team; false otherwise

method.name: search
method.comment:
Returns an ordered range of all the user groups that match the name and description.

Useful when paginating results. Returns a maximum of end - start instances. start and end are not primary keys, they are indexes in the result set. Thus, 0 refers to the first result in the set. Setting both start and end to {@link com.liferay.portal.kernel.dao.orm.QueryUtil#ALL_POS} will return the full result set.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group's company

param.name: name
param.comment: the user group's name (optionally null)

param.name: description
param.comment: the user group's description (optionally null)

param.name: params
param.comment: the finder params (optionally null). For more information see {@link com.liferay.portal.service.persistence.UserGroupFinder}

param.name: start
param.comment: the lower bound of the range of user groups to return

param.name: end
param.comment: the upper bound of the range of user groups to return (not inclusive)

param.name: obc
param.comment: the comparator to order the user groups (optionally null)

method.return: the matching user groups ordered by comparator obc

method.name: searchCount
method.comment: Returns the number of user groups that match the name and description.

param.name: companyId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group's company

param.name: name
param.comment: the user group's name (optionally null)

param.name: description
param.comment: the user group's description (optionally null)

param.name: params
param.comment: the finder params (optionally null). For more information see {@link com.liferay.portal.service.persistence.UserGroupFinder}

method.return: the number of matching user groups

method.name: setUserUserGroups

method.name: addUserGroup
method.comment:
Adds a user group.

This method handles the creation and bookkeeping of the user group, including its resources, metadata, and internal data structures.

param.name: name
param.comment: the user group's name

param.name: description
param.comment: the user group's description

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if the user group's information was invalid or if the user did not have permission to add the user group

method.name: deleteUserGroup
method.comment: Deletes the user group.

param.name: userGroupId
param.comment: the primary key of the user group

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if a user group with the primary key could not be found, if the user did not have permission to delete the user group, or if the user group had a workflow in approved status
